content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to real-time information, prices, or specific recommendations. However, I recommend searching on travel websites or platforms like booking.com, Airbnb, or TripAdvisor. You can refine your search by specifying your preferred location, amenities, and dates of stay. These websites provide detailed and verified information about the rural cottages' facilities, location, and reviews from previous guests, which can help you narrow down your options and make an informed decision.
